Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Smd2 (S. calcitrans defensin 2; defensins; UCSS1a; 3S=S, natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrate, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: mRNA in anterior midgut tissues, stable fly,Stomoxys calcitrans

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (75%) tofrog Formica defensinpI 7.66;Host expression:constitutive: Some levels of Smd2 transcripts are found in the midgut constitutively.Activity: The HPLC fraction was active against E. coli at 24 uM byitself.
Literature Information.Author: Lehane MJ, Wu D, Lehane SM.1997
Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1997 Oct 14;94(21):11502-7.Pub-Med.
Literature Information.Title: Midgut-specific immune molecules are produced by the blood-sucking insect Stomoxys calcitrans.
